Key Match Events: Lautaro Martínez scored the winning goal in the 112th minute from a precise through ball by Giovani Lo Celso
Lionel Messi left the field due to an ankle injury in the 64th minute
Nicolas Otamendi, 36, and Angel Di Maria, 36, announced their retirement after the match
Post-Match Reflections: Di Maria expressed gratitude and joy for winning the title in this manner
Messi appeared to know his tournament was over when he fell and took off his boot in frustration
Martínez hugged his captain after scoring the winning goal
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match started 75 minutes late due to crowd control issues
Colombia was more aggressive and forced goalkeeper Emiliano Martínez to make four saves in the first half
Numerous players lost their footing during the second half due to wet grass
